snippet: The members of the Knicks’ 1973 N.B.A. championship team will be honored at Madison Square Garden on Friday night.
abstract: Members of the New York Knicks 1973 NBA championship team, including former coach Phil Jackson, will be honored at Madison Square Garden as the franchise celebrates its 40th anniversary of its last title.
lead_paragraph: The members of the Knicks’ 1973 N.B.A. championship team will be honored at Madison Square Garden on Friday night.

headline.seo: At Garden, Phil Jackson and Knicks Will Party Like It’s 1973
headline.main: Jackson Back at Garden to Celebrate 1973 Team
headline.print_headline: Jackson Back at Garden To Celebrate 1973 Team
